rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Garage Access
rooms.description: A spacious entry with integrated two-car garage access, ensuring a seamless transition from the outside to the interior.

rooms.name: Guest Living Area
rooms.description: An Art Deco styled living space featuring elegant geometric patterns and luxurious finishes, serving as a reception area for guests.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A formal dining room with high ceilings and decorative moldings inspired by Art Deco aesthetics.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen / Dining Integration
rooms.description: An open-concept kitchen area that flows into the dining space, complete with state-of-the-art appliances and elegant decor aligning with the farmhouse style.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance tools, discreetly placed near the kitchen area.

openings.location: Throughout the level for natural light
openings.description: Large Art Deco style windows ensuring ample daylight and ventilation, strategically placed per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious master suite featuring an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, decorated in Art Deco style with elegant finishes.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom designed with comfort and privacy in mind, maintaining a farmhouse aesthetic with modern touches.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space offering ample natural light and a quiet environment, positioned according to Vastu for professional success.

rooms.name: Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: Complementary bathroom suite shared by the second bedroom and master suite.

openings.location: Adjacent to Master Bedroom and Second Bedroom
openings.description: Overhanging balconies providing outdoor access, with privacy screens ensuring comfort and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.location: Throughout the level for optimal natural light
openings.description: Large windows designed in Art Deco style for enhanced lighting and aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Deck / Lounge
rooms.description: A multi-functional space featuring a swimming pool area along with a deck/lounge for relaxation and social gatherings. The design incorporates Art Deco decorative elements while ensuring privacy and compliance with local building norms.

openings.location: Leading to the Swimming Pool Deck
Side walls for natural light and views
openings.description: Windows strategically placed to optimize daylighting and create a harmonious connection with the outdoors.

notes: The floor plan design integrates Art Deco aesthetics with farmhouse functionality, ensuring compliance with local building norms. Vastu principles are observed in room positioning for optimal energy flow and natural light distribution. The two-car garage is efficiently integrated into the ground floor for ease of access. The home office is positioned on the first floor to benefit from a quiet environment conducive to productivity. Additional features include ample open spaces, high ceilings, decorative mouldings, and luxury finishes throughout.
